full_threads.body:
Hi Amy,

We have updated the site. 
- Calendar Furniture/Decors Items. Calendar Day (Info Column) and Calendar Month (Below part of each boxes) Please see the attached. 
- "Process clients credit card" Confirming its all done. 
- RFP "info" toggle button moved next to "Please note a $1000..".

Product Page Layout
- https://huntleyandco.com.au/dashboard/catalogues/?cat=95
Let me know if this works for you? 

As you are aware, we enter the purchase price in the back end of the website, this helps us generate the sale price. Is it possible to have 3 x fields ...
- Heath will speak with you about this one.

@rica Disregard the below.

@rica +8hrs. Thanks!

Thank you for your quick reply. I have made a few more comments below.

Kind Regards

Amy Smith

AMY SMITH CEO + CREATIVE DIRECTOR

E. amy@huntleyandco.com.au

P. 02 8310 2285 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Amy,

Just an update on this ticket. Please see below asterisk(*):

Is it possibly to show how many items are on a job in all phases of the dashboard. This helps us to see how big / small jobs are when we are booking them in the calendar. Ideally it would separate furniture and décor…i.e. 32 (10-F/22-D)
- DONE. It is under the Order title. I can't seem to find this anywhere? Please advise where this is shown. We really need it on the dashboard across all tabs so we can see the job size easily in every phase.
* Sure, please see the attached. First column of "Selection, Confirmed, Delivered, Processing". Underneath the order title. 

Payment page: We have noticed there is an option "process clients credit card". What does this mean? I think there should be 3 options:....
- Work in progress Please let me know what the time frame on this is likely to be please.
* The "process clients credit card" is only visible for "administrator" access. This payment option is being used for RFP Orders.

Is it possible to have the hover button feature in the trade site so stylist can see the styled image in the catalogue and also in the selection phase? This exists in the RFP site already.
- Done Can the hover also work in the selection phase please?
* Sure, we have updated the selection, when a stylist is selecting a product. Please see the attached

We have now added the measurements for the rugs in their name so the "I" button for rugs is no longer needed on the product (but please keep on the quote page)
- Done I can still see the "i" button on the RFP site. Please remove from there too.
* Confirming we have excluded the rugs to not show the dimension tooltip.

I have also had a look at the "i" button for the bond. I think we need to show clearly (without pressing the "i" "Please note a $1000 bond against damage is payable when you book a job with Huntley + Co" and then show the "i" button that they can click on for more detail. The text should sit just above the "Proceed to Checkout" button and below the Summary box. I hope that makes sense! The Read more FAQs button seems to be a very different font and colour to the rest of the site. Can you please remove that button, it's not needed if all the copy is in the "i" button.
* All good now on this one.

Stock Reports, here is the current update. We will give you more info for this one.
* https://huntleyandco.com.au/dashboard/reports-table/

Still work in progress (We will give you an update by end of the week)
As you are aware, we enter the purchase price in the back end of the website, this helps us generate the sale price. Is it possible to have 3 x fields ...

Now I know there is probably a bit of work involved for this one so that is why I have put it last. I've compared the beautiful new RFP site and trade site a few times and there feels to be a bit of a different vibe between the two. RFP is new school H+C but the Trade seems to still have a bit of the old school vibe! I've screenshot the two side by side to show you. Is there way to make the trade site a bit more like the RFP please? I LOVE the new style.

Hello,

I hope you are both well.

I'm just checking the changes in the email below and had a few queries:

Is it possibly to show how many items are on a job in all phases of the dashboard. This helps us to see how big / small jobs are when we are booking them in the calendar. Ideally it would separate furniture and décor…i.e. 32 (10-F/22-D)

As you are aware, we enter the purchase price in the back end of the website, this helps us generate the sale price. Is it possible to have 3 x fields ...
- Work in progress Please let me know what the time frame on this is likely to be please.

Payment page: We have noticed there is an option "process clients credit card". What does this mean? I think there should be 3 options:....
- Work in progress Please let me know what the time frame on this is likely to be please.

Is it possible to have the hover button feature in the trade site so stylist can see the styled image in the catalogue and also in the selection phase? This exists in the RFP site already.
- Done Can the hover also work in the selection phase please?
We have now added the measurements for the rugs in their name so the "I" button for rugs is no longer needed on the product (but please keep on the quote page)
- Done I can still see the "i" button on the RFP site. Please remove from there too.

Now I know there is probably a bit of work involved for this one so that is why I have put it last. I've compared the beautiful new RFP site and trade site a few times and there feels to be a bit of a different vibe between the two. RFP is new school H+C but the Trade seems to still have a bit of the old school vibe! I've screenshot the two side by side to show you. Is there way to make the trade site a bit more like the RFP please? I LOVE the new style.
- Work in progress Please let me know what the time frame on this is likely to be please.

I have also had a look at the "i" button for the bond. I think we need to show clearly (without pressing the "i" "Please note a $1000 bond against damage is payable when you book a job with Huntley + Co" and then show the "i" button that they can click on for more detail. The text should sit just above the "Proceed to Checkout" button and below the Summary box. I hope that makes sense! The Read more FAQs button seems to be a very different font and colour to the rest of the site. Can you please remove that button, it's not needed if all the copy is in the "i" button.

Can you please also advise where you are at with the stock reports.

Thank you.

Kind Regards

Amy Smith

AMY SMITH CEO + CREATIVE DIRECTOR

E. amy@huntleyandco.com.au

P. 02 8310 2285 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hello,

Just checking in re a few small things for the website that I am hoping we can change (I say small but maybe they aren't so please tell me if a lot of work is involved!!).
  1. Is it possibly to show how many items are on a job in all phases of the dashboard. This helps us to see how big / small jobs are when we are booking them in the calendar. Ideally it would separate furniture and décor…i.e. 32 (10-F/22-D)
  2. Can you please show if a client has selected Y/N to art hanging on the drivers PDF's. They need to know this for the delivery.
  3. As you are aware, we enter the purchase price in the back end of the website, this helps us generate the sale price. Is it possible to have 3 x fields
  • Purchase cost (ex GST)
  • Freight cost (ex GST)
  • Total Cost (ex GST)….Ideally, this would automatically calculate the purchase and freight. This is the number we use to calculate the sale price.
  1. Payment page: We have noticed there is an option "process clients credit card". What does this mean? I think there should be 3 options:
  • Direct deposit (Even if a client selects this, there should be a note saying "Please note credit card details are required when you place an order with Huntley + Co".)
  • Credit card
  • Charge existing credit card
  • Please also add this to the payment page…."Huntley + Co reserves the right to charge your credit card the ongoing weekly rate, on a week to week basis, at the end of the initial hire period unless written confirmation has been received at least 3 business days prior to the end of the paid period, stating that the stock is ready for collection. The ongoing weekly rate can be viewed on your order".
  1. Is it possible to have the hover button feature in the trade site so stylist can see the styled image in the catalogue and also in the selection phase? This exists in the RFP site already.
  2. We have now added the measurements for the rugs in their name so the "I" button for rugs is no longer needed on the product (but please keep on the quote page)
  3. On the trade site, please change the product page from saying "Accessories and Rugs" to just "Rugs".
  4. Now I know there is probably a bit of work involved for this one so that is why I have put it last. I've compared the beautiful new RFP site and trade site a few times and there feels to be a bit of a different vibe between the two. RFP is new school H+C but the Trade seems to still have a bit of the old school vibe! I've screenshot the two side by side to show you. Is there way to make the trade site a bit more like the RFP please? I LOVE the new style.

Feel free to call me if you would like to discuss any of this.

Thank you!
Kind Regards
Amy Smith

AMY SMITH
CEO + CREATIVE DIRECTOR

E. AMY@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

P. 02 8310 2285
W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU
